tool_description: Evaluates the completeness of student applications by checking all required components and documents, providing a comprehensive status report.

application_id.description: Unique identifier for the student application

required_components.description: Array of required application components to check

personal_info_complete.description: Whether personal information section is complete

test_scores_submitted.description: Whether required test scores are submitted

application_fee_paid.description: Whether application fee has been paid

error_messages: Invalid required_components: Must contain at least one component to check.
Missing application_id: A valid application ID is required.
Invalid component status: All boolean parameters must be true or false.
Required components mismatch: The number of components doesn't match the provided status information.
usage: Provide application_id, required_components array, and status of all required components. Optionally include essays_submitted, additional_documents, and program_specific_requirements. Returns comprehensive completeness assessment.

overall_completeness.description: Overall completeness status: complete, incomplete, pending_review

missing_components.description: List of missing or incomplete components

ready_for_review.description: Whether application is ready for admissions review

estimated_completion_date.description: Estimated date when application might be complete

priority_actions.description: Priority actions needed to complete the application
